verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H935>them<s%>, When ye are come into the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H4186>habitations<s%>, which I give unto <S%H5414>you<s%>,

and will <S%H6213>make<s%> an offering by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, or a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>, to <S%H6381>accomplish<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%>, or as a <S%H5071>freewill-offering<s%>, or in your set <S%H4150>feasts<s%>, to <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, of the <S%H1241>herd<s%>, or of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>;

then shall he that <S%H7126>offereth<s%> his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> of a tenth part of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>:

and <S%H3196>wine<s%> for the <S%H5262>drink-offering<s%>, the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%>, shalt thou <S%H6213>prepare<s%> with the <S%H5262>burnt-offering<s%>, or for the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>, for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%>.

Or for a <S%H352>ram<s%>, thou shalt <S%H6213>prepare<s%> for a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth parts of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>:

and for the <S%H5262>drink-offering<s%> thou shalt <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And when thou <S%H6213>preparest<s%> a <S%H1121>bullock<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, or for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>, to <S%H6381>accomplish<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%>, or for <S%H2077>peace-offerings<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>;

then shall he <S%H7126>offer<s%> with the <S%H1241>bullock<s%> a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth parts of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>:

and thou shalt <S%H7126>offer<s%> for the <S%H5262>drink-offering<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, for an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Thus shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H7794>bullock<s%>, or for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>, or for each of the <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%>, or of the <S%H5795>kids<s%>.
According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> that ye shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%>, <S%H3602>so<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>do<s%> to every <S%H259>one<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number<s%>.

All that are <S%H249>home-born<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> these things after this <S%H7126>manner<s%>, in offering an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And if a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> with <S%H8432>you<s%>, or whosoever may be among you throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>, and will <S%H6213>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; as ye <S%H6213>do<s%>, so he shall <S%H6213>do<s%>.

For the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>, there shall be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H1616>you<s%>, and for the stranger that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> with <S%H2708>you<s%>, a statute for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>: as ye <S%H1616>are<s%>, so shall the sojourner be <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
One <S%H259><s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> shall be for <S%H1616>you<s%>, and for the stranger that sojourneth with <S%H1481>you<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H935>them<s%>, When ye come into the <S%H776>land<s%> whither I bring <S%H935>you<s%>,
then it shall <S%H398>be<s%>, that, when ye eat of the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, ye shall offer <S%H7311>up<s%> a <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%> ye shall offer <S%H7311>up<s%> a <S%H2471>cake<s%> for a <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%>: as the <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%> of the <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%>, so shall ye heave <S%H7311>it<s%>.
Of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%> ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> a <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
And when ye shall <S%H7686>err<s%>, and not <S%H6213>observe<s%> all these <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>,

even all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you by <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> gave <S%H1755>commandment<s%>, and onward throughout your generations;

then it shall <S%H6213>be<s%>, if it be done <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%>, without the <S%H5869>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, that all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, with the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> <S%H4503>thereof<s%>, and the drink-offering <S%H4941>thereof<s%>, according to the ordinance, <S%H8163>and<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5795>he-goat<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and they shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%>; for it was an <S%H7684>error<s%>, and they have <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H7133>oblation<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and their <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, for their <S%H7684>error<s%>:

and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%>, and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H5971>them<s%>; for in respect of all the people it was done <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%>.

And if <S%H5315>one<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%>, then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H5795>she-goat<s%> <S%H1323>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H7683>erreth<s%>, when he <S%H2398>sinneth<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5545>him<s%>; and he shall be forgiven.

Ye shall have <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> for him that doeth <S%H6213>aught<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%>, for him that is <S%H249>home-born<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> among <S%H8432>them<s%>.

But the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> aught with a high <S%H7311>hand<s%>, whether he be <S%H249>home-born<s%> or a <S%H4480>sojourner<s%>, the same <S%H1442>blasphemeth<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Because he hath <S%H959>despised<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and hath <S%H6565>broken<s%> his <S%H4687>commandment<s%>, that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H3772>utterly<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>; his iniquity shall be upon <S%H5771>him<s%>.

And while the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, they <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7197>gathering<s%> <S%H6086>sticks<s%> upon the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And they that <S%H4672>found<s%> him <S%H7197>gathering<s%> <S%H6086>sticks<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> him unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and unto all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>.
And they <S%H3240>put<s%> him in <S%H4929>ward<s%>, because it had not been <S%H6567>declared<s%> what should be done to <S%H6213>him<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, The <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>: all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H7275>stones<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> him <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him to <S%H4191>death<s%> with <S%H68>stones<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>bid<s%> them that they <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H6734>fringes<s%> in the <S%H3671>borders<s%> of their <S%H899>garments<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%>, and that they <S%H5414>put<s%> upon the <S%H6734>fringe<s%> of each <S%H3671>border<s%> a <S%H6616>cord<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>:

and it shall be unto you for a <S%H6734>fringe<s%>, that ye may <S%H7200>look<s%> upon <S%H2142>it<s%>, and remember all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H8446>them<s%>; and that ye follow not <S%H310>after<s%> your own <S%H3824>heart<s%> and your own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> which ye use to play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>;
that ye may <S%H2142>remember<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> all my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto your <S%H430>God<s%>.

I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, who brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to be your <S%H430>God<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
